title: PLEASE HELP ME GUYS!
body:
Well, I have very big problem with LoL. I don't know why, maybe you can help me. I have quite fast internet it's about 100/20 mbps. Everything works great browsers and all steam games work great but when I open LoL and I login it takes about 2-3 minutes to log me in. And then when I'm in client and want to play some games It takes also 2-3 minutes to create a lobby. Then when I finnally come in game lobby I mean draft pick I can't ban or choose any champions because I can't see them. There is only black window where champions should be.
Guys please help me I put a lot of time in LoL and now this happens. 
Thank you for all help! :D

replies.body: We've been noticing a lot of EU players having packet loss issues, and it seems to possibly be isolated to a specific ISP node that your connection is being routed through. Try running through the steps in this [**sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu), and if that doesn't help go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your network logs.
